title: Mirror
notes: Game runs perfectly, but there is no text in the dialog screens or conversation choice options.

title: Mirror
notes: Works perfectly, but you need to install corefonts in game's wineprefix. Easiest way is to install https://github.com/Sirmentio/protontricks and then run $ protontricks 644560 corefonts

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
Needs wine corefonts to render most ingame text.. use protontricks to install corefonts with command "protontricks 644560 corefonts" . If you are on arch make sure you have latest mesa and llvm installed.
If you experience crash ( Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation. ) , add "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%" to steam launch options.
